channel.title: CVE Feed for Dancer::Plugin::SimpleCRUD -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dancer::Plugin::SimpleCRUD -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010084|2024-08-05T03:07:18.178Z -- dancer%3A%3Aplugin%3A%3Asimplecrud -- dancer%3A%3Aplugin%3A%3Asimplecrud
item.description: Dancer::Plugin::SimpleCRUD 1.14 and earlier is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: Potential for unathorised access to data. The component is: Incorrect calls to _ensure_auth() wrapper result in authentication-checking not being applied to al routes.
